definition[0]: a group of people who live together and who share the work and their possessions
definition[1]: the smallest unit of local government in countries such as France and Belgium
definition[2]: a group of people in a Communist country who work as a team on a farm, and give what they produce to the state
definition[3]: a group of people who live and work together and share what they produce
definition[4]: a group of people who work together on a farm owned by the state, and give what they produce to the state
definition[5]: the smallest division of local government in countries such as France and Belgium
example[2]: The Auvergne is divided into four Departments which are organised into Cantons and ultimately consist of 1,308 Communes.
